description: Try our easy to follow Thai Beef Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Thai Beef Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 lean rump or sirloin steaks, about 150 g each, trimmed
2 tbs sesame seeds, lightly toasted (to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Put the steaks in a preheated hot griddle pan and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side. Allow to rest for 10-15 minutes, then slice the meat thinly.
Meanwhile, cook the sweetcorn in boiling water for 3-4 minutes or until tender. Refresh under cold water and drain well.
Slice the cucumber in half lengthways, then scoop out and discard the seeds. Cut the cucumber into 5 mm slices.
Put the beef, sweetcorn, cucumber, onion and chopped coriander in a large bowl. Stir in the vinegar and chilli sauce and mix well. Garnish the salad with sesame seeds and serve.
